stories.text:
Hey fellow HN,
How do you relax after the working hours so that you are in a good mood for sleep?
Especially in the Work From Home and start-up scenarios.
Any suggestions would be helpful.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you relax after work?

stories.text:
Recent events have made me realize I should at least consider switching away from Heroku.

I run a handful of small PHP apps with Redis and Postgres as add-ons. Max 5 Standard 1X dynos per app.

I want strong GitHub integration and would also like the replacement to be Docker-based.

I imagine there are tons of developers like me out there. It seems there are many options out there. Which ones would you recommend?
stories.title: Ask HN: What should I use instead of Heroku?
